articles.description: In spite of a shaky start to the game against Oman, India staged a fitting comeback by virtue of a splendid header from Manvir Singh from a Bipin Singh cross. Now, Igor Stimac's men will be facing a tougher opponent in the form of UAE at the Zabeel Stadium, i…

articles.author: Revathi Krishnan
articles.title: Move over Kolaveri Di. Here’s why Tamil song Enjoy Enjaami is creating ripples this poll season - ThePrint
articles.description: Produced by A.R. Rahman's Maajja and sung by Dhee and Arivu, Enjoy Enjaami talks about the feudal system, landless farmers and the caste system.
articles.content: Chennai: In a divisive and fractured Tamil Nadu election season, a hip-hop song Enjoy Enjaami is acting as a unifier across class, age and geography in the state. With over 68 million views on YouTub… [+5380 chars]
